Custom Theme Development

Bootstrap Based Theme for Applications

Design Guidelines

  • You may only place text in components with a background.
  • Use text color sparingly, keep track of it, and ensure it is always readable.

Rotational Gradients

  • · 64 Additional Classes
  • · Naming scheme: bg-primary gr-degree of angle
  • · Angles 45°, 90°, 135°, 180°, 225°, 270°, 315°.
  • · Colors primary, secondary, success, info, warning, danger, light, dark.
  • · Example: "bg-primary gr-45" applies a primary colored gradient at 45° of angle.
  • · Note: 0° angle is expressed without indicating any degree of angle (ex: Gradient of primary color at 0° is written as "bg-primary gr").
  • · Note: you can lower class count (file size) by removing angles from configuration.
  • · Note: you fallback on standard colors by disabling the Rotational Gradient stylesheet.

bg-primary gr
